# Client Group (Data Source)

Data source for client groups.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the client group to look up.

### Optional

- `site` (String) The name of the site the client group is associated with.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this client group.
- `qos_rate_max_down` (Number) The maximum download rate.
- `qos_rate_max_up` (Number) The maximum upload rate.
